Bold Cuts.
Fearless Colors.
Unique You.

Hair by Minh is a boutique salon located in Houston, Texas.
Visits are by appointment only.

Schedule Appointment

Meet Minh

Minh's journey into the world of hair styling began at the prestigious Vidal Sassoon Academy in Santa Monica, California, where she received her classical training in hair cutting. Her quest for excellence then led her to Chicago, where she completed the rigorous ABC’s of Cutting program, renowned for its emphasis on precision.

But Minh didn't stop there. Her passion for hair styling propelled her to become an expert in color treatments, earning her the title of certified Goldwell Master Colorist after comprehensive training with Goldwell. Always eager to evolve, Minh continuously enhances her skills by attending academy classes and collaborating with esteemed brands like KMS and Oribe.

Services

We use only the highest quality of industry standard products and techniques to cut, color and style your hair to perfectiion, including Oribe and Goldwell. Schedule a consultation to discuss how we can bring your dream look to life.

Style

We can style you to look your best and feel your most confident for any event or occasion.

Cut

Step into the spotlight with a haircut that redefines your style. We are here to deliver a cut that perfectly aligns with your individuality and lifestyle.

Color

We use only the highest quality Goldwell products to achieve the most healthy, vibrant, and long-lasting color results.

Love from our clients

“Minh is a super star. She is not just a hairdresser. She is an artist. And she wants to make you feel and look your best when you leave the salon.

Luis E.

“Minh has been cutting and coloring my hair for years and is a magician! Her balayage technique is flawless and she knows just how to handle my very thick, seemingly endless supply of wavy hair. She is also so kind and easy to communicate with!

“I've been told by many barbers and stylists alike that my hair is incredibly difficult to cut. Minh has always risen to the challenge and been able to deliver on a great haircut every single time. She's definitely one of the best around at what she does, and I wouldn't hesitate to recommend her to anyone!

Ryan N.

“ Minh has been doing my hair for years. I absolutely love her! She is by far the best stylist I’ve ever had! Perfect cut and color every time!

Andrea L.

“I'll follow Minh wherever she goes! I get constant compliments on my color and even when I'm unsure of what I want, she makes magic out of my hair!

Sunni H.
